name: Orium
description:
Welcome to Orium offline! In this game, you have to survive as much as you can in the arena, which is in Akkari village, the land of orcs. With a bow and gold coins you will be able to clean the arena.

Controls:

Movement: W A S D  

Attack: Space bar

Buy upgrades : Left click mouse on boxes.

Try to survive at least 10 mins. 

Good Luck!
